it.uniba.game

Class Move

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.uniba.game.Move

  • public final class Move
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a generic move converted from the string inserted by the user.
    Class type : < Entity >

    Responsibilities :
    Knows :
    • The types of castling
    • The piece to move on the ChessBoard
    • The starting position of the piece to move
    • The ending position of the piece to move
    • If the piece to move captures a piece
    • If the move is en passant
    • If the move is a castling
    Does :
    • Gets or changes the piece to move
    • Gets or changes the starting and ending position of the piece to move
    • Gets or changes if the move is a capture
    • Gets or changes if the move is en passant
    • Gets or changes if the move is a castling
    Author:
    LeCun group

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Move.Castling
      Enumerated type used to represent the castling of the move.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Move

        public Move(Piece pieceToSet,
            it.uniba.game.Coordinates startPos,
            it.uniba.game.Coordinates endPos,
            boolean cap)
        Constructor for the class Move. If the move is a castling, input parameters can be null and the type of the castling should be set after the construction, since it is initialized as Castling.NO_CASTLING. Futhermore both startPos and endPos are assumed to be between (0,0) and (7,7) or Constants.EMPTY_COORD since this class doesn't have the responsibility to check their correctness. Finally, it also initializes the flag en passant as false
        Parameters:
        pieceToSet - The piece involved in the move to be set.
        startPos - The coordinates of the starting square of the piece to be set.
        endPos - The coordinates of the ending square of the piece to be set.
        cap - Boolean indicating whether the move is a capture to be set.

      • getCaptureFlag

        public boolean getCaptureFlag()
        Getter method for the capture flag.
        Returns:
        true if the move is a capture, false otherwise.

      • getEnPassant

        public boolean getEnPassant()
        Getter method for the en passant flag.
        Returns:
        true if the move is an en passant capture, false otherwise.

      • setEnPassant

        public void setEnPassant()
        Sets the en passant flag as true.

      • setCastling

        public void setCastling(Move.Castling newCastling)
        Sets the type of the castling. If newCastling==null then the method does nothing.
        Parameters:
        newCastling - Castling enumeration to be set.

      • getCastling

        public Move.Castling getCastling()
        Getter method for the castling type.
        Returns:
        A Castling enumeration indicating whether and which castling the move is.
